text: Univel headquarters building in Sandy, Utah Univel, Inc. was a joint venture of Novell and AT&T;'s Unix System Laboratories (USL) that was formed in October 1991 to develop and market the Destiny desktop Unix operating system, which was released in 1992 as UnixWare 1.0. Univel existed only briefly in the period between AT&T; initially divesting parts of USL in 1991, and its eventual outright purchase by Novell, which completed in 1993, thereby acquiring rights to the Unix operating system. Novell merged USL and Univel into their new Unix Systems Group (USG). == See also== * DOS Merge 3.0 * DR DOS 6.0 ==References== Category:1991 establishments in the United States Category:AT&T; subsidiaries Category:Companies established in 1991 Category:Defunct computer companies of the United States Category:Novell Category:Unix history
title: Univel
